mapper.sql: pid, pname, purl, pavailable, pcreate_time, pupdate_time
mapper.select: SELECT pname FROM sys_permission LEFT JOIN sys_role_permission ON sys_permission.pid = sys_role_permission.srp_permission_id LEFT JOIN sys_role ON sys_role.rid = sys_role_permission.srp_role_id WHERE sys_role.rname =( SELECT rname FROM sys_role LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ON sys_role.rid = sys_user_role.ur_role_id LEFT JOIN sys_user ON sys_user.uid = sys_user_role.ur_user_id WHERE sys_user.usercode = #{usercode} )
